Docs.summary: Provides objects for the sort arrow of a header item. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.Header.SortArrow class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the sort arrow of a header item.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.SortArrow.SortedDown%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementHeaderSortArrow2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
